name: Buster brains colosseum
description:
Shoot and bash zombies in this fast paced arcade shooter!

Controls:

W: Move up

A: move left

S: move down

D: move right

Mouse: aim

Left mouse click: Fire/Swing

R: Reload gun

1: switch to gun

2: switch to bat.

Keep killing zombies to keep your combo counter up. The higher your combo, the more points you get for each zombie killed.
